name: MOHAMMED AFRIDH . N
title: National Level Skating Player
message: Passionate and results-driven Skating Coach with over 7+ years of experience in coaching, mentoring, and inspiring students in roller skating and multiple other sports. Adept at creating individualized training programs that cater to a wide range of skill levels and age groups. Known for motivating athletes to push their limits and achieve excellence while fostering a positive and disciplined learning environment.
